#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define inf 1e18
#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x);
#define debug(x) cerr << x << endl;
#define debug2(x) for(int i = 0 ; i < x.size() ; i++)  { cerr << x[i] <<" "; } cerr << endl;
#define debug3(x,n) for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) { cerr << x[i] <<" "; } cerr << endl;
#define MAX 200005
using namespace std;
int a[MAX];
int dp[MAX][29];
int main()
{
  string s;
  cin >> s;
  int q;
  s(q);
  dp[0][s[0] - 'a'] ++;
  for(int i = 1; i< s.size(); i++) {
    for(int j = 0; j < 26; j++) {
        dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j];
    }
    dp[i][s[i] - 'a']++;
  }
  while(q--) {
    int l , r;
    s(l) ; s(r);
    l--;
    r--;
    int answer = 0;
    int mx = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
        int temp = 0;
        if( (l - 1) >= 0)
            temp = dp[r][i] - dp[l-1][i];
        else
            temp = dp[r][i];
        if( temp%2 == 0) {
            answer+= temp;
        } else {
            if( mx != 1) {
                mx = 1;
            }
            answer += temp - 1;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n", answer + mx );
  }
  return 0;
}
